article:
Bob and Mike are in the same school, _  they are in different classes.Their favorite  _  is Chinese.They  _  Chinese is very interesting.They go to school on weekdays.They go to school  _  7:00 in the morning.Today is Tuesday.Bob and Mike are in their own  classrooms.
Bob  is having  an English class.Look!He is talking  _  his English teacher in English.Mike is having a Chinese class.His teacher is talking  _  Beijing Opera with them.The students are looking at their teachers.They  are listening  carefully .But one of Bob's classmates  is reading  a storybook,because he isn't good at English and he  doesn't like  English.
